definition[0]: a model or example that shows how something works or is produced
example[0]: the basic paradigm of the family tree
definition[1]: a very clear or typical example of something
example[1]: Pius XII remained the paradigm of what a pope should be.
definition[2]: a good example of how a product, system etc can work or be produced
example[2]: J.J.'s success in building Tylenol into a best-seller has become a paradigm of consumer drug marketing.
